title: Embroidered Picture, 1815–25
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, cross and knotting stitches on plain weave
dimensions: Frame H x W x D: 45.1 x 40 cm (17 3/4 x 15 3/4 in.)
description: Picture of a small boy carrying a hat in a rural landscape. After an engraving "Father's Joy" published in 1815 by T. Palser, Westminster Bridge. Glazed and framed with eglomisé glass.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1815–25.
1815–25. Medium: wool embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, cross and knotting stitches on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. H.P. Davison. 1974-72-8.
